entry.title: Apple and the Metaverse: Everything We Know So Far
entry.summary: Apple’s mixed reality headset is reportedly on the horizon, but will its immersive vision tie into the Web3 metaverse?

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Says He Won’t Spend $1B on Political Races—Despite 'Dumb Quote'
entry.summary: The billionaire FTX CEO now says he'll be pausing his political spending until further notice.

entry.title: El Salvador’s Bukele Remains Popular Despite Bad Bitcoin Bets, Slumping Economy
entry.summary: Nayib Bukele has one of the highest approval ratings among leaders in Latin America, a new survey shows.

entry.title: Mango DAO Offers Hacker $47M to Settle Without Pressing Charges
entry.summary: The hacker stole over $100 million in crypto from the Mango Markets Exchange on Tuesday, and may get to keep almost half of it.

entry.title: Ethereum Wallet MetaMask Adds Instant Bank-to-Crypto Transfers
entry.summary: The fox is getting an upgrade thanks to one stinky fish.

entry.title: Bitfinex 'Pleased' With Law Firm Roche Freedman's Removal From Class Action
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Bitfinex said it's "pleased" with the judge's decision to remove Roche Freedman from the lawsuit alleged it committed fraud.

entry.title: No Big Deal: ZEBEDEE Contributes to Bitcoin Lightning Network Open Source Development
entry.summary: Bitcoin-centric startup ZEBEDEE announced a new initiative that contributes open source code and products to the Lightning Network space.

entry.title: Oscar Winner Anthony Hopkins’ First NFT Collection Sold Out in Minutes on OpenSea
entry.summary: NFT buyers scooped up a diverse collection of NFT artworks, inspired by Hopkin’s long and acclaimed career.

entry.title: Binance Launches $500 Million Lending Pool for Bitcoin Miners
entry.summary: Soaring energy costs, low Bitcoin prices, and high mining difficulty mean miners are turning to lenders, like Binance, to stay afloat.

entry.title: Bitcoin Firm NYDIG Slashes 110 Jobs Amid Ongoing Crypto Bear Market: Report
entry.summary: NYDIG has reportedly cut its workforce by roughly 33%, planning to explore more profitable areas of business.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Erase Losses Following Hot Inflation Report
entry.summary: Leading cryptocurrencies in Bitcoin and Ethereum followed stocks’ rebound after yesterday’s CPI report showed continued inflation woes.

entry.title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta Metaverse Legs Were Staged
entry.summary: The billionaire founder did say, "Seriously, legs are hard."

entry.title: How Gitcoin Taps Community Voting to Give Out Millions in Crypto
entry.summary: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead explains how its grants work and the importance of community voting.

entry.title: Crypto Market Is ‘The Tail Being Wagged by a Very Sick Dog’: Ethereum Co-Founder Joe Lubin
entry.summary: Why is ETH down so badly since the merge? ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin says "the economy is broken."

entry.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
entry.summary: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

entry.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.

entry.title: Beeple Building Physical Studio to Bring NFTs Into the Real World
entry.summary: The artist behind the top NFT sale of all time is establishing a South Carolina studio to create and share digital artwork.

entry.title: Magic Eden Losing Market Share as Solana NFT Traders Reject Royalties
entry.summary: Are creator NFT royalties on the way out on Solana? Zero-royalty trading platforms are quickly gaining traction, and Magic Eden is adapting.

entry.title: Ethereum Decentralized Exchange Uniswap Raises $165M in New Funding
entry.summary: Polychain Capital led the Series B with participation from a16z crypto and others.

entry.title: Tether Eliminates Commercial Paper From Reserves in Transparency Push
entry.summary: Having battled rumors before, the stablecoin hopes to remove all doubt.

entry.title: Binance Burns as Many BNB Tokens as Hacker Minted From Thin Air
entry.summary: The burn removed over 2 million BNB from the circulating supply.

entry.title: CoinShares Creates Twitter Bot That Gives Traders 'Fair Prices' for Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: Want to know how much your Bored Ape is really worth? Here’s one way to find out.

entry.title: Dominican Government Partners With Tron To Launch Dominica Coin
entry.summary: The DMC token will promote Dominica’s national and cultural heritage—and utilize the mechanics of a ‘fan token,’ in a first for a country.

entry.title: Skype Co-Founder Leads $13M Investment in Liquid-Cooled Bitcoin Mining Tech
entry.summary: Fabric Systems aims to make Bitcoin mining greener by building “immersion-native” systems.

entry.title: Solana Price Falls Below $30 for First Time Since June
entry.summary: SOL is taking a harder hit than Bitcoin or Ethereum today, falling to a four-month low.

entry.title: Stolen Crypto Total Hits $3B as Hackers Reemerge After Quiet Summer: Chainalysis
entry.summary: Theft and exploits dipped with markets over the summer. Now, hacker activity has spiked again, according to Chainalysis.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge ‘Sets Precedent for Further Change’: StarkWare President Ben-Sasson
entry.summary: StarkWare's president Eli Ben-Sasson shared his vision of how a three-layered system can further scale the Ethereum network.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Continue Tumble Following Hot Inflation Numbers
entry.summary: Bitcoin has followed the stock market—again—following the release of the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics' consumer price index (CPI).

entry.title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $19,000 Ahead of Fresh U.S. CPI Report
entry.summary: The world's largest cryptocurrency Bitcoin is on a downward trend again on Thursday, falling to a three-week low below $19,000.

entry.title: Five Charged in France With $2.5M Fraud Targeting Bored Ape NFT Owners
entry.summary: Noted online crypto sleuth "ZachXBT" played a key role in helping French authorities uncover the fraudulent Bored Ape NFT scheme.

entry.title: Elizabeth Warren Calls Texas 'Deregulated Safe Harbor' for Bitcoin Miners
entry.summary: A letter from Elizabeth Warren and six other Democrat senators demands financial and operational information about Bitcoin mining in Texas.

entry.title: Sushi, Lido Finance Drop 10% as Top DeFi Tokens Plunge
entry.summary: Over the past 24 hours, tokens underpinning popular DeFi protocols like SushiSwap and Lido Finance have taken a battering.

entry.title: Coin Metrics CEO: Big Banks 'Want In' on Crypto—When It’s More Regulated
entry.summary: Firms active in crypto are concerned about their reputation, but those coming in care more about mitigating risk.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried on the Mango Markets Hack: ‘Make Up Your Own Damn Mind’
entry.summary: The FTX CEO took the DeFi community to task for putting too much trust in oracles.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady as Market Awaits Pivotal Inflation Data
entry.summary: The CPI report will be released tomorrow. Stocks have taken a hit, but Bitcoin remains more resilient—so far.

entry.title: Coin Center Sues Treasury Over Tornado Cash Ban
entry.summary: The federal suit could highlight conflicting statements from federal agencies as to Ethereum’s national status.

entry.title: Crypto Fitness App STEPN Denies Layoff Reports
entry.summary: The “move-to-earn” app strenuously denies reports that it is being left behind in a larger company transition.

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Reserves Are at a 12-Year Low—Here’s Why
entry.summary: Bitcoin mining reserves have dropped to just 1.91 million BTC, the lowest level since February 2010.

entry.title: Crypto.com Follows Binance Into France, Invests $145M in Paris HQ
entry.summary: The company last month received regulatory approval to register in France as a digital asset service provider.

entry.title: Regulators Are Targeting Stablecoins Due to ‘Crazy Product Market Fit’: Compound’s Robert Leshner
entry.summary: Stablecoins do what Bitcoin was expected to do, argues Leshner, adding that “if left to their own devices, they will win and conquer everything.”

entry.title: BNB Chain Upgrade Restores Cross-Chain Transfers Following Binance Bridge Hack
entry.summary: The Moran hard fork seeks to amend several issues on the BNB Chain stemming from its $100 million hack last week.

entry.title: Mango Hacker Uses Stolen Funds to Pit Community Against Developers
entry.summary: The Mango Market hacker is now using looted governance tokens to vote in the project’s DAO about how best to resolve the hack.

entry.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
entry.summary: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.

entry.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.

entry.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment
entry.summary: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.

entry.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do
entry.summary: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.

entry.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk
entry.summary: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.

entry.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs
entry.summary: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."

entry.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.

entry.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2
entry.summary: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.

entry.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.

entry.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps
entry.summary: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.

entry.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder
entry.summary: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

entry.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022
entry.summary: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.

entry.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."

entry.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY
entry.summary: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.

entry.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'
entry.summary: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.

entry.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT
entry.summary: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.
